```{r}
library(dplyr)
library(stringr)
library(lubridate)
```

```{r}
plasticContainer <- list(
  greenBox=c("paper","scissor"),     # location 1
  redBox=c(1,3,2.5),               # location 2
  blueBox=c(TRUE,FALSE,TRUE,TRUE)    # location 3
)
```

#[[.]]可用元素名稱或位置
```{r}
plasticContainer[["greenBox"]] 
plasticContainer[[1]]
```


```{r}
plasticContainer[[1]][[1]]
```
#ex1不是list
```{r}
成績單 <- c(
  個經=90,
  總經=77,
  統計=88
)
```
```{r}
成績單[["個經"]]
成績單[[1]]
```
#ex2不是list
```{r}
studentRecord <-
  list(
    學號="410073058",
    姓名="王小明",
    性別="男",
    學年平均成績=list(
      一年級=88,
      二年級=90.3,
      三年級=92,
      四年級=95
    )
  )

studentRecord
```

```{r}
studentRecord[[2]]
studentRecord[[4]][[3]]
```

#中括號的特色在於可保有母層次的結構(list) 
#一個中括號只能用在取一群物件!!
```{r}
plasticContainer[c("greenBox","redBox")] 
plasticContainer[c(1,2)]
```

#兩個中括號綠色丟掉了
```{r}
extract1 <- plasticContainer[c("greenBox")]
extract1
extract2 <- plasticContainer[[c("greenBox")]]
extract2
```
#想從box取出paper 
```{r}
extract1[[1]][[1]]
extract2[[1]]
```
#用T,F決定要不要取
```{r}
length(plasticContainer)
plasticContainer[c(T,F,T)]
```
ex
```{r}
成績單
成績單[c(FALSE,TRUE,TRUE)]
```
```{r}
plasticContainer$greenBox
plasticContainer[["greenBox"]]
```

```{r}
your_github_username <- "tpemartin"
```
